concept.title: 19.502-7 Inclusion of Federal Prison Industries, Inc.

conbody.p: When using competitive procedures in accordance with 8.602(a)(4), agencies shall include Federal Prison Industries, Inc. (FPI), in the solicitation process and consider a timely offer from FPI.
